item.title: 15 inch pothole after turn into Cooper's Hill, 5th January
item.description:
Pothole is located on edge of previous patched road surface on the first turn after turning onto Cooper's Hill. Grass beside it has been driven over by many people in order to avoid it.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brockworth, Tewkesbury

item.title: Pothole, 5th January
item.description:
You've logged the pothole at the junction of Pottersfield Road and New Road for repair, which I reported —thank you. However this one which I reported at the same time is just as bad (you have to swerve to avoid it). As you'll have a crew coming out anyway would it not make economic sense to repair this one at the same time?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pottersfield Road, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping - large fan in black plastic bin liner, 5th January
item.description:
Has been dumped in the hedgerow on Hatherley Lane since at least November 25: what 3 words : lively.breath.radio
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hatherley Lane, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street light not on, 5th January
item.description:
USRN : 40103545 Street : BISHOPS CLEEVE FOOTPATH 37 Number : ABC37 Type : FP Along this foot path near orchard house. I observed that there is a street lamp that is not operational. It was dark when I went along there a few weeks ago and the path was unlit. It is not clear if this is a GCC responsibility but it appears to be a regular streetlight along a PROW. FYI - I could not report this as a broken streetlight because fixmystreet only allows street light reporting on highways and not along PROW.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Woodman's Way, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pot hole in the road, 5th January
item.description:
Hi. There is a tarmac'ed over square that must have been a manhole at some point. The tarmac is now sinking and when vehicles hit it, it makes our whole house (37 Hales Road) shake. We're property 63 on your map.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 59, Hales Road, Battledown, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Filter light not working, 5th January
item.description:
Filter light not working (or only intermittently) for the turning onto Pirton Lane. This has been a constant problem since the new lights were installed. This causes traffic to back up onto Elmbridge roundabout at peak times and causes late collections for school pick ups. Please sort this out as it’s increasingly frustration for me to report this multiple times with no permanent resolution.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road East, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Green or amber traffic light is not working
